ai-patthana14.18:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.18:1.1_0: Defiled by defilements that arise from defilements. Nor do they give rise to diversity of defilement.
ai-patthana14.18:3.1_0: Defiled by defilements and defilements, Defiled by defiling influences, and by the principle not to arise.
ai-patthana14.18:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.18:5.1_0: The group of six on wishing is finished.
